1101011110111101 1000100111111100 1 -> sum: 0110000110111010, cout: 1

0010100011111101 0001100011100010 0 -> sum: 0100000111011111, cout: 0
0110000000001000 1010001100011011 0 -> sum: 0000001100100011, cout: 1
1101110000000000 1001110011000100 0 -> sum: 0111100011000100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
